name: Notes with Caller ID
description: HIGH-QUALITY NOTEPAD  Notes with Caller ID is a top note-taking app for Android packed with many great features making it more than just a notepad.  Simple and easy to use Notes with Caller ID gives you a quick and easy note-taking experience. Not only is this free notepad app simple and easy to use but also comes with a to-do checklist which can be shared quickly via email, a search function, data backup, and restore features.  Connect your contacts to notes Notes with Caller ID lets you connect your contacts to your notes in a very useful way. This clever note-taking app then lets you click-to-call directly from a note.  Identify callers and make instant notes after calls More than just a note-taking app, this smart notepad identifies callers and presents you with practical options on a call information screen after the call. There are many useful features such as writing and saving a note using the information you can see, directly on the call information screen. Other options include saving the number to your contacts, calling back, sending an SMS, and more!  Notes App Features:    Handy note search feature for people who take a lot of notes.  Create a new note and link it to a contact  click-to-call directly from the note.  Take, edit, export, and view all notepad entries effortlessly.  Backup and restore your notes easily.  Save new contacts to your phonebook with one click, call back or send SMS.  Identify callers and search numbers in worldwide databases with 1 billion+ numbers.  Get warnings for millions of spam numbers.  For your privacy and data protection, we do not have access to any of your notes or store any of the information contained within them. Therefore, we recommend that you regularly use the useful backup feature on this app to avoid the accidental loss of any important information.
